FdoPhysicalSchemaMappingCollection Class Reference

#include <PhysicalSchemaMappingCollection.h>

Inherits GisCollection< FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping, FdoCommandException >, FdoXmlDeserializable, and FdoXmlSerializable.

Inheritance diagram for FdoPhysicalSchemaMappingCollection:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

FdoPhysicalSchemaMappingCollection defines a collection of Schema Override sets. This is a generic collection which can contain override sets for different FDO Providers.

Definition at line 39 of file PhysicalSchemaMappingCollection.h.


Public Member Functions

FDO_API FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping * GetItem (FdoIConnection *connection, GisString *schemaName)
 Gets the Schema Override set for the specified Feature Schema and the FDO provider for the specified connection. This function allows an application to retrieve the Schema Overrides for an active provider without knowing the provider name.
FDO_API FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping * GetItem (GisString *providerName, GisString *schemaName)
 Gets the Schema Override set for the specified FDO provider and Feature Schema.
FDO_API FdoPhysicalSchemaMapping * GetItem (GisInt32 item)
 Gets the Schema Override set in the collection at the specified index. Throws an invalid argument exception if the index is out of range.
virtual FDO_API GisXmlSaxContext * GetSaxContext ()
 Gets the SAX context to pass to the GisXmlSaxHandler callbacks. Classes derived from FdoXmlDeserializable can override this function to specify a SAX context with class-specific information.
virtual FDO_API void XmlEndDocument (GisXmlSaxContext *context)
virtual FDO_API GisXmlSaxHandler * XmlStartElement (GisXmlSaxContext *context, GisString *uri, GisString *name, GisString *qname, GisXmlAttributeCollection *atts)
 Default Sax callback that is called when the GisXmlReader reads the start tag for an XML element in the document. Does nothing.
